name: J fmdevil
text: We were traveling back from Kansas City when we decided to stop in Lamoni Iowa for lunch, with not much options we chose here and were very pleased. â€¦More

name: Brenda Galvan
text: Delicious food and the waitress was very friendly! Employees are doing an awesome.

name: Skyler Todd
text: One of the older ladies at the counter was very rude to me with how I was going to be paying for my meal. I donâ€™t recommend splitting to bill in two, or they will throw a fit. We argued for a good few minutes and then she finally gave up and I proceeded to pay. But was a very poor experience at this Pizza Hut.

name: wade anderson
text: The food and staff are top quality!!

name: KIM JACKSON
text: Wonderful service, good fresh food, & clean restaurant

name: Colleen Hinshaw
text: Very good price and food!!!

name: Tad Whittom
text: We almost always get friendly, smiling service here. The food is pretty consistent as well. I especially like that they have a back room where larger groups (with noisy kids) can go and not really bother the rest of the customers. Lamoni is fortunate to have Pizza Hut!

name: Emily Smith
text: They always have deals going on so check their website before ordering! They have buffet several times a week too. Sometimes delivery can run slow but order ahead is schedule.

name: Rodney Burton
text: Pizza wasnt bad but they were way over priced specially for the quality of the pizza. I feel like I got screwed over on a pizza . I'm not going back to this location

name: Karina Lopez
text: Awesome food very clean

name: Bruce Priebe
text: Love it when i dont want to cook ! Great job !!!

name: Sandy Willis
text: Hood food!  Good service!

name: Cody Waddell
text: Really good wings

name: kimberly watson
text: They had gluten free pizza

name: Cheryl Porter
text: Great service good food

name: Thelma C Webb
text: Very good pizza fast service

name: Sue Thompson
text: The food was good and good service

name: Jennifer Layton
text: My son's pizza was not fully cooked! They did not offer to make it right with us! They told us that's just how that pizza looks! Really!!!!

name: Twong Wells
text: Great place to eat

name: James Major
text: Great food and people

name: Tianna Goddard
text: This Pizza Hut has the Udi's gluten free crust and follow the proper procedures for the pizza to be gluten free. They do a wonderful job.

name: Pete Walker
text: Great service.  Very friendly.  Great pizza.

name: Jerome Reimers
text: Just a bad experience this last trip. I ordered a pizza for pickup at 6:15 at around 4:30 and didn't receive it until 6:28. There was also no bbq sauce in the box, but other than that the pizza was okay.

name: Rhonda Mckinney
text: They need to get their kitchen under control. Was there over a hour and only got part of our order. Very dissatisfied with the kitchen at this store! My server was really nice but the kitchen cost her the tip.

name: Rick The Reviewer
text: After paying for two pizzas, I was delivered one and given the option of waiting for the second.  "Trying their best" is a gentle way of saying "can't do it" and for the cost/inconvenience, I can let somewhere else try it's best.

name: Nichole curl
text: Love the pizza and salad bar

name: Mariah Smith
text: Either the girl at the counter was having a really bad night or she just really hates her job. She wasn't friendly at all and they gave me the wrong order. When I called to let them know we got the wrong order the girl put the phone down and I waited for someone to answer then I got hung up on. Normally they're really nice.

name: Diana Jackson
text: Food good.... waitress very friendly

name: Stephanie Grim
text: This Pizza hut doesn't honor the Pizza hut ads, they say they don't have to, and their people that answer the phone are rude when you ask about it. Thanks but I'll buy Casey's since all their stores honor their ads.

name: chris daleske
text: Great pizza... good service.

name: Rod Carns
text: Love the thin crust and buffet

name: Rebecca Harris
text: Great cinnamon sticks.

name: Travis Tull
text: Another waitress gave our food to another table of college kids who naturally ate it knowing it wasn't theirs

name: Jay Bird
text: Been enjoying their food for 40+ years ðŸ˜‹

name: Brenda Comer
text: Best pizza hut in southern Iowa!

name: Sophie Johnson
text: Pan pizza tastes good. But the service is terrible. That tall blond (I don't know she dyed her hair or she is real blond) girl with round face is pretty rude and had no idea how to behave like a waitress. Her face was like you took her too â€¦More

name: Anthony Bulter
text: Been here 4 times for a church retreat. It's pretty good.

name: David Green
text: Great pizza

name: Crisetta Gilliam
text: If you know anything about Lamoni, there is about three restaurant and this is one of them. I can say my visit was pleasant, and the food was good.

name: Jim Richardson
text: liked the service.

text: The menu offers a third med pizza instead of hot wings. But when u call to order it they claim they cant do it.

name: Donnie Simmons
text: Pay 15.00 for wings and they want to charge you for extra ranch that's a load of b.s if you ask me

name: George Sloan
